review: OK, the first unit I received was DOA... but as usual Amazon came thru with a rapid replacement. The replacement looks like a brand new unit and works perfectly. I am a convert from Apple TV and am an otherwise 100% iOS user. But Amazon Fire TV knocks the Apple TV into a cocked hat. I prefer everything about it, from the menus to the rock-steady reliability. I even side-loaded XBMC (Kodi) and can stream my own videos from a Synology NAS. The voice search is useful and reliable, wish it worked in all apps (Netflix??).
